pages.text: 1. Access Chain Network: After access is granted on an Chain Conveyor, Maids will treat it as part of a storage network, automatically storing items as packages on the chain; note this access is unidirectional—Maids only deposit packages and never take any (including their own).

$(br)2. Access Stock Ticker: If a Stock Ticker is within the range, she can act as Create's stock manager; the stock ticker functions without requiring a seated entity nearby, and you may access its interface via the right-side button in the maid's GUI.

$(br)3. Access Stock Ticker+: When a maid requires items (e.g., for auto-crafting), she will request them from Create's storage network via the Stock Ticker; the requested items will be packaged into the logistics network.

$(br2)Note: Packages must be delivered within the maid’s working range (≈5 blocks) via conveyors/chains for retrieval; additionally, packages requested by the maid on chains will automatically pathfind to the closest accessible point to her.
